actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-642.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests

official_title: A bill to adjust the boundary of Carson National Forest, New Mexico.
short_title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2011

summary.text: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2011 - Adjusts the boundary of the Carson National Forest in New Mexico to incorporate approximately 4,990 acres of land identified as the Miranda Canyon Boundary on the map entitled "Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment" and dated September 21, 2010.

titles.title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2011
A bill to adjust the boundary of Carson National Forest, New Mexico.
